[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=662802][img]https://i.imgur.com/i36UAgI.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=#ffffff]Hack Forums Ficons Evolved to Sprites[/color][/b]
Along with the many other performance and site improvements being made through the collaboration of [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999F1]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] and [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][b][color=#9999F1]Xerotic[/color][/b][/url], the newest change comes in the form of converting hundreds of Ficons to a single image and a CSS page that controls them which can be found here: https://hackforums.net/cache/themes/theme10/ficon.css

The image being used can be seen here: https://hackforums.net/uploads/ficons/ficon_sprite.png

Those who have issues seeing the icons correctly, simply press Ctrl-F5 on the [url=https://hackforums.net]Hack Forums[/url] home page to fix the problem.

[size=xx-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5846729]>>see thread[/url][/size]

P.S. The recent changes will be in Edition 396

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[b][color=white]Interview[/color][/b]
Unfortunately, I was unable to get an interview done for this edition. Please expect one for next week's Edition 396.

[b][color=white]Experimental Edition[/color][/b]
Like last edition, this edition will be the core sections only. Let us know what you think of these short editions! Edition 396 will return back to normal.
